alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT OKALOOSA AND NORTHERN SANTA ROSA COUNTIES THROUGH 200 PM CDT... At 106 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Laurel Hill to near Pea Ridge. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Pace, Milton, Bagdad, Baker, Laurel Hill, Pea Ridge, Roeville, Floridatown, and Point Baker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
